name: Magmortar
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

poke_body.name: Flame Body
poke_body.effect: When you attach a {R} Energy card from your hand to Magmortar, remove 2 damage counters from Magmortar.

attacks.name: Flame Blast
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage times the number of {R} Energy attached to Magmortar.

attacks.name: Fireball Bazooka
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
